title: Looking for lower grade Bates & Lobert
author: t213

posts.post_title: Looking for lower grade Bates & Lobert
posts.post_content:
I'm interested in buying Bates or Lobert in the $20-30 range. Clean back, untrimmed, but I'm otherwise condition flexible. Any back for Bates. For Lobert, any back except P150.

Thanks,
Andy
